entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [API Compat] Add MSBuild task to run API Compat standalone #18677
    7.0.1xx

Updated

  • Allow projects to control which configuration is used by default when publishing #26534
    Backlog
  • Can't update packages NU1007 : runtime.json could not be found #26551
  • Allow dotnet publish to use --runtimes #26584
    Discussion
  • UseCommonOutputDirectory=true breaks CopyLocalLockFileAssemblies flag #23342
  • dotnet build --framework builds referenced project twice #26690
  • dotnet build does not run without sudo #10553
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • add rule for detecting attribute differences #26891
    Area-Compatibility

Merged

  • Fix package installer tests #26843
    Area-Infrastructure
  • ApiCompat: Add ValidateAssemblies msbuild task and add global tool #26616
    Area-Compatibility

Updated

  • Use the Implicit SDK RID for RID-Specific Apps by Default + Add PublishSelfContained #26143
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [DRAFT] Get PublishRelease working in .csproj #26808
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Stop double copying all of the watch and format files. #26811
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate dotnet new Cli, dotnet-new3, *.IntegrationTests, *.UnitTests, template_feed to SDK #26521
    Area-Templates
